title.narrative: Improved beneficiary, partner and national knowledge, capacity, and coordination to deliver effective health programming and advances in the reform of the national health care system.

• Caritas Jordan has continuously strengthened health staff competencies and programming skills • Caritas Jordan has organisational systems and procedures in place in line with CIMS and CHS • Caritas Jordan collaborates with key health policy actors in their efforts to advance and realize national commitments to health care reform and UHC

target.value:
CJ health clinics operate to national clinical and reporting guidelines. CJ has up-to-date MEAL and PES systems appropriate for the organisation.
More strategic and focussed contribution to national efforts towards an inclusive, less fragmented, national primary healthcare delivery system, primary healthcare reform and development (preventive and curative) more in line with WHO guidelines, and to national efforts and action in support of SDG 3 goals, in particular reduction of NCD premature mortality within the country.
